name: DataEndureDigitalResilience
skdetail:

Invocation Name: data endure digital resilience
Developer Terms of Use
des: Modern workloads use data created from many sources to power data analytics and advanced machine learning. This vast flow of information has become the lifeblood of organizations. This skill uses a question-and-answer format to explain how DataEndure can help enterprises survive and thrive by protecting, storing, and accessing this valuable asset as well as recovering quickly should an adverse event occur.
priv:
